additionalProperty.name: Warning
additionalProperty.value: WARNING: DO NOT SPRAY NEAR A NAKED FLAME OR ANY HOT SURFACE. KEEP AWAY FROM SOURCES OF IGNITION - NO SMOKING. AVOID DIRECT INHALATION. USE IN WELL VENTILATED PLACES, AVOID PROLONGED SPRAYING. KEEP OUT OF REACH OF CHILDREN. Do not apply to broken or sore skin. Stop use if irritation develops. Do not spray near eyes or face. CAUTION: Pressurised dispenser. Protect from sunlight and do not expose to temperatures exceeding 50C. Do not pierce or burn, even when empty. Intentional misuse by deliberately concentrating or inhaling contents may be harmful or fatal.

description: Rexona Women's Antiperspirant Aerosol Advanced Bright Bouquet Deodorant
name: Women's Antiperspirant Aerosol Advanced Bright Bouquet Deodorant
